div.p: The whole thing depends on the proper attributions of author and recipient in each case.
6214, 1870 V, VPRS 1187 inwards correspondence registers, VA 860 Chief Secretary's Office, Public Record Office, Victoria.
'Asst Commr of Lands & Survey asks permission for Mr Ferguson to visit Hamilton & Penshurst in reference to preservation of native trees growing there'.]
